ygData.subject: Re: Need help on hunting places
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Dunno bout that place - Meldrath inside and the Hero randomly spawning outside. The only reason I ever went there was to get a mino axe, and then I found
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Alex Candelaria" <candel@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Need help on hunting places
>Date: Mon, 17 May 1999 13:13:43 -0700
>
>From: "Alex Candelaria" <candel@...>
>
>If you get charmed, click on your sit/stand button over and over, as many
>times as you can. This will keep you from 'walking into his lair' until
>the
>charm wears off. while you are sitting/standing, you don't move, or
>attack,
>which is good :). However, other beasties can get in free attacks on you
>tho... and you can't fight back until the charm wears off :(
>
>-Alex
>aka: Goatnatos, lvl 17 Bard, Povar Server
>
> > If you do decide to venture in deeper, try to avoid going too
> > far in (especially the far left passage). Meldrath (a L53
> > necromancer I hear) lives inside and casts some nasty spells
> > on you through the walls. The worst, which thankfully has
> > never happened to me, is charm, at which point you will
> > merrily waltz into his lair to die, leaving your corpse
> > unrecoverable.
> >
> > --
> > John H. Kim
> > kim@...

Dunno bout that place - Meldrath inside and the Hero randomly spawning
outside. The only reason I ever went there was to get a mino axe, and then I
found out that it's much easier to get them from Beholder.

Sartori of Kelethin
